an10.66:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sāriputto magadhesu viharati nālakagāmake.
an10.66:4.2: Atha kho sāmaṇḍakāni paribbājako yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
an10.66:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an10.66:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sāmaṇḍakāni paribbājako āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
an10.66:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, sāriputta, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye sukhaṃ, kiṃ dukkhan”ti?
an10.66:5.2: “Anabhirati kho, āvuso, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye dukkhā, abhirati sukhā.
an10.66:5.3: Anabhiratiyā, āvuso, sati idaṃ dukkhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
an10.66:5.13: Anabhiratiyā, āvuso, sati idaṃ dukkhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ.
an10.66:6.1: Abhiratiyā, āvuso, sati idaṃ sukhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
an10.66:6.11: Abhiratiyā, āvuso, sati idaṃ sukhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhan”ti.
